name: Standard Will (Maharashtra)
description: Last Will and Testament for Hindu/Christian/Parsi individuals in Maharashtra. Based on Indian Succession Act 1925 and Hindu Succession Act 1956.
author: DroitDraft Legal Research
content:
Drafting Date: {{ drafting_date }}

LAST WILL AND TESTAMENT

I, {{ testator_full_name }}, aged about {{ testator_age }} years, residing at {{ testator_address }}, do hereby revoke all my former Wills and Covenants and declare this to be my Last Will and Testament.

1. DECLARATION: I am in my sound state of mind and body and I am making this Will without any pressure or influence from any person.

2. EXECUTOR: I hereby appoint {{ executor_name }}, residing at {{ executor_address }}, as the Sole Executor of this my Will.

3. BENEFICIARIES AND ASSETS: I give and bequeath my properties as follows:
- Immovable Property: {{ immovable_property_description }} shall go to {{ immovable_beneficiary_name }}.
- Movable Assets: {{ movable_assets_description }} shall go to {{ movable_beneficiary_name }}.

4. ATTESTATION: In witness whereof I, the Testator, have signed this Will at {{ place_of_execution }} on this {{ date_of_execution }}.

Signed by the Testator: __________________

WITNESSES:
1. {{ witness1_name }}, {{ witness1_address }}
2. {{ witness2_name }}, {{ witness2_address }}

(Note: This draft follows the simple format recommended by Law Mumbai and Sec 63 of the Indian Succession Act 1925.)

name: Probate Petition (Bombay High Court)
description: Petition for grant of Probate of a Will. Based on Bombay High Court (Original Side) Rules and ISA 1925.
author: DroitDraft Legal Research
content:
Drafting Date: {{ drafting_date }}

IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
TESTAMENTARY AND INTESTATE JURISDICTION

PETITION NO. ____ OF 2026

In the matter of the Last Will and Testament of:
{{ deceased_name }}, Deceased.

{{ petitioner_name }} ... Petitioner

TO,
THE HONORABLE CHIEF JUSTICE AND OTHER COMPANION JUSTICES OF THE HIGH COURT.

THE PETITION OF THE PETITIONER ABOVENAMED STATES AS UNDER:

1. The Petitioner is the Sole Executor named in the Will dated {{ will_date }} of the deceased {{ deceased_name }}.
2. The deceased died at {{ place_of_death }} on or about {{ date_of_death }}.
3. The deceased at the time of death had a fixed place of abode at {{ deceased_address }} within the local jurisdiction of this Court.
4. The Petitioner has listed the assets and liabilities in Schedule I and II.
5. PRAYER: Your Petitioner prays that Probate of the said Will may be granted to him having effect throughout the State of Maharashtra.

Verification: I, {{ petitioner_name }}, do hereby declare that what is stated above is true to my knowledge.

(Note: Based on Proforma provided by Bombay High Court under Rule 374.)

name: Letters of Administration (Intestate)
description: Petition for Letters of Administration when the deceased died intestate. Based on ISA 1925 Sec 218.
author: DroitDraft Legal Research
content:
Drafting Date: {{ drafting_date }}

IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
TESTAMENTARY AND INTESTATE JURISDICTION

PETITION FOR LETTERS OF ADMINISTRATION

In the matter of the Estate of {{ deceased_name }}, Deceased.

{{ petitioner_name }} ... Petitioner (Relation: {{ petitioner_relation }})

1. The abovenamed deceased died intestate at {{ place_of_death }} on {{ date_of_death }}.
2. The legal heirs of the deceased are: {{ list_of_heirs }}.
3. No Will or other Testamentary disposition has been found.
4. The Petitioner is the {{ petitioner_relation }} and is entitled to a share in the estate.
5. The total value of the estate is estimated at Rs. {{ estate_value }}.

Prayer: That Letters of Administration may be granted to the Petitioner.

(Note: Based on High Court of Bombay templates for Intestate Succession.)

name: Development Agreement (Housing Society)
description: Agreement for redevelopment between a Housing Society and Developer. Based on MOFA and RERA.
author: DroitDraft Legal Research
content:
Drafting Date: {{ drafting_date }}

DEVELOPMENT AGREEMENT

THIS AGREEMENT is made at {{ location }} on this {{ date }}

BETWEEN: {{ society_name }}, a Co-operative Housing Society registered under the Maharashtra Co-operative Societies Act, 1960, having its address at {{ society_address }}, hereinafter called 'The Society'.

AND: {{ developer_name }}, a Company/Firm having its office at {{ developer_address }}, hereinafter called 'The Developer'.

WHEREAS:
1. The Society is the owner of the land and building known as {{ property_name }}.
2. The Society has invited proposals for redevelopment as per the General Body Resolution dated {{ resolution_date }}.

CORE CLAUSES:
- FSI/TDR: The Developer shall utilize the base FSI and purchase TDR as per MCGM/DCR rules.
- RERA: The Developer shall register the project under MahaRERA.
- CORPUS: The Developer shall pay Rs. {{ corpus_amount }} to the Society.
- ALTERNATE ACCOMMODATION: The Developer shall provide rent of Rs. {{ monthly_rent }} per month to each member.

(Note: Structure derived from standard redevelopment formats for Maharashtra Housing Societies, incorporating Circular No. 79A requirements.)

name: Sale Deed (Residential Flat)
description: Deed of Sale for transfer of ownership of a flat in Maharashtra. Based on Registration Act 1908.
author: DroitDraft Legal Research
content:
Drafting Date: {{ drafting_date }}

DEED OF SALE

THIS DEED OF SALE is executed at {{ location }} on {{ date }}

BETWEEN: {{ seller_name }}, residing at {{ seller_address }}, hereinafter called 'The Vendor'.

AND: {{ buyer_name }}, residing at {{ buyer_address }}, hereinafter called 'The Purchaser'.

1. PROPERTY: All that piece and parcel of Flat No. {{ flat_number }}, on the {{ floor }} floor of the building known as {{ building_name }}.
2. CONSIDERATION: The Vendor has agreed to sell and the Purchaser has agreed to buy the property for a total consideration of Rs. {{ sale_price }}.
3. POSSESSION: The Vendor has handed over the vacant and peaceful possession of the property to the Purchaser.
4. INDEMNITY: The Vendor assures that the property is free from all encumbrances and lithigations.

SCHEDULE OF PROPERTY:
Detailed Description: {{ property_schedule }}

(Note: Based on model forms from Maharashtra Housing and Building Laws and NoBroker Maharashtra templates.)
